page.title: 18A Waltham Adult's Day.
page.content: Mrs.Holland was born in Barnoldby-le -Beck and has lived in Waltham nearly all her life.A typical day starts at 7.30a.m.,when she may watch television in bed and have a cup of tea.Before she leaves for school she puts on her make-up and tidies the house. During the morning,she teaches her fourth year junior class English and Mathematics and the afternoon may be spent teaching dance and drama in preparation for a concert. Mrs.Holland likes to have a chat with the staff at playtimes and hears the village news when she goes to the Post Office at lunchtimes. Her evening is spent on her work as a Parish Councillor,doing housework and watching television.On Saturday she likes to shop for clothes and on Sunday relax or drive to other parts of the country to visit her family.
